test.name: Chinese Test #5: UTF-8
test.data: This file has 1 Chinese character, encoded using a decimal numeric character reference. It is a UTF-8 encoded file with no non-ASCII characters (i.e. it is also an ASCII or iso-8859-n file).
The XML header of this file is <?xml encoding="UTF-8"?>.
It is the Chinese character for middle. It should look like a box with a vertical line through its middle.
